data.title: Mark Garnier
data.meta_description: Mark Robert Timothy Garnier is a British Conservative Party politician and former banker who has been Member of Parliament (MP) for Wyre Forest since 2010 and Shadow Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State for Energy Security and Net Zero since July 2024. He was a junior minister at the Department for International Trade from July 2016 to January 2018. He was previously chair of the Committees on Arms Export Controls.
